mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_device_stats ( full_short_url, gid, date, cnt, device, create_time, update_time, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{fullShortUrl}, #{gid}, #{date}, #{cnt}, #{device}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + #{cnt}, update_time = #{updateTime};
mapper.select:
SELECT device, SUM(cnt) AS cnt FROM t_link_device_stats lds
inner join t_link l on lds.full_short_url = l.full_short_url and lds.gid = l.gid and l.del_flag = 0
WHERE lds.full_short_url = #{requestParam.fullShortUrl} AND lds.gid = #{requestParam.gid} AND lds.date BETWEEN #{requestParam.startDate} AND #{requestParam.endDate} GROUP BY lds.device
